name: MLMultiArrayShapeConstraint
desc: The lists of shapes or ranges of shapes that constrain a multiarray feature.

items.desc: Array of allowed shapes for a multiarray feature.

items.desc: The allowable range for a dimention of the multiarray.

items.desc: The type of the shape constraint.

items.desc: The possible types of shape constraints.
